alert.note: Alert for Adams; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 1:06AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS AND WESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 145 AM EDT... At 105 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Rarden to Petersville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, New Boston, Vanceburg, Rosemount, Clarktown, Camp Dix, Rome, Lucasville, Blue Creek, Otway, Saint Paul, Kinniconick, Friendship, Mcdermott, Charters, Petersville, Stricklett, Rexton, Lombardsville and Sandy Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM EDT for northeastern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
